user.name: Gabriel Yee
user.bio:
ABOUT ME

Gabriel Yee, 15
Washington DC, USA

I am an aspiring software developer and data analyst, excited to take on challenges that push me beyond my comfort zone. With a passion for both software development and data analytics, I have honed my skills through various projects.

Outside of coding, I am a dedicated cross-country, swimmer, and volleyball athlete, balancing my time between academics and extracurriculars. I also dabble in the art of chess. I have competed in prestigious tournaments such as the Maryland Scholastic 2025 Championship and the 2025 SUPERNATIONALS VIII.

work.title: Replit Bounty Hunter
work.description:
Freelancer through Replit Bounty Program
Full Stack Developer
Remote
Apr 2025 - Present

Tech Stack: Typescript, Javascript, Python, Flask, Bash, PostgreSQL, Java, AI

Worked with numerous individuals in order to help their ideas become reality. Coded and programmed numerous web apps and worked to successfully bring people's ideas to life.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: A portfolio website for software developers. The code is open sourced, enabling anyone to fork it and load up their own portfolio website.

projects.name: IMG2PGN
projects.description: Streamlining the digitization of chess notation sheets. By uploading a photo of your chess notation sheet, the program extracts the text and converts it into a usable PGN.

projects.name: JagBots Scouter
projects.description: A high-end analytical website designed to allow FRC teams to better scout and analyze the competition.

projects.name: WordHunt
projects.description: Developed alongside three others, this program won first place in the Brook Codes hackathon. This program recreates the popular iOS GamePigeon game, WordHunt for the web.

projects.name: ScoreTracker
projects.description: A simple, clean two team score tracker for usage on touchscreen devices
